mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, AUTHORITY FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND AUTHORITY = 2
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DEL_FL, BOARD_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" USING(BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y'
SELECT READ_COUNT, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE READ_COUNT = (SELECT MAX(READ_COUNT) FROM "BOARD")

SELECT BOARD_NO, LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD_LIKE GROUP BY BOARD_NO ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) JOIN "BOARD" USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT BOARD_NO, COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM "COMMENT" GROUP BY BOARD_NO ORDER BY COMMENT_COUNT DESC ) JOIN "BOARD" USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, NULL, NULL, DEFAULT, 'N', 2 )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" WHERE AUTHORITY = 2
